name: Looking Glass (Lucas LaMonica)
description:
By Team Looking Glass

In this first-person puzzle game, you must traverse through a strange place and collect shards. However, looking into mirrors, especially colored ones, reveal secrets and objects not found without them.

This was a project we started at Full Sail University for our final project, and now after working on it more after graduation, we wish to put out. Any feedback is appreciated. Thank you.
